brand.title: OCI Lab Incubator 19-20: Call for contributors

slideDefaults.title: Q{{index}}
slideDefaults.cancelTitle: Clear all answers and start again

slides.title: OCI Lab Incubator 19-20
slides.subtitle: Call for contributors!
slides.body:
Open Collective Intelligence Lab is a P2P online incubator to support aspiring young social entrepreneurs in the MENA region through online mentoring and networking.

13 Project teams were shortlisted for the OCI LAB intense project incubation track of the program, which offers them one on one mentoring and specialized technical support to move their initiatives forward.

Until today, the project leaders had three online labs. The online labs supported them to identify the Social-Ecological Problem in their Communities, to define their solution and their project value proposition, and to Set up their action plan and draft their Lean Business Model Canvas.

These three steps helped them assess their project requirements that will be satisfied through a contribution system.

In this framework, we are calling for skilled people (called contributors) to join the OCI Lab Incubator team.

A contributor is anyone who:
  1. Has a set of skills
  2. Is looking for a rewarding experience
  3. Wishes to use her/his skills for the common good
  4. Wishes to take part and contribute in a social venture in the MENA region (Tunisia, Lebanon, Jordan, Morocco or Egypt)

slides.title: Basic info
slides.body: Please provide us with contact information about you.

fields.name: birthplace
fields.error: Please enter your place of birth

fields.name: residence
fields.placeholder: In which country do you live?
fields.error: Please enter your country of residence

slides.title: Select your projects
slides.body:
Please read the projects' descriptions in this file and write down the project names of the ones you're interested in contributing.

Which Project(s) do you want to be involved in? (you can choose more than one)
  1. AI Mental healthcare
  2. Alphawomen
  3. Colex
  4. Data Science Academy
  5. Didi asks
  6. Diyafa
  7. Kenzimor
  8. Leafs
  9. Pailleco
  10. Spellit
  11. The identity app
  12. Zed
  13. Zellij invent

slides.title: Your motivation
slides.body: Why do you want to contribute to the mentioned projects?

slides.title: Your expertise
slides.body:
What is your domain of expertise? Please mention only items from the following list.
  1. Artificial intelligence
  2. Business development
  3. Crowdfunding
  4. Data science
  5. Event Planning
  6. Game designing
  7. Marketing and branding
  8. Media & communication
  9. Neuroscience
  10. Photography
  11. Product development
  12. Production Process
  13. Programming / web development
  14. Social Media
  15. Web Design
  16. Youth management

slides.title: The last little bit!
slides.body: We need your consent for using your responses as part of our online forum.

fields.name: consent
fields.placeholder: I understand that this form is used for community driven research. Researchers are encouraged to treat your answers as a window into societal, economic, technological, and political trends and transformations that affect us. As I participate in the discussion, I do not fear bad consequences when sharing with others my views and alignment on societal, economic, technological and political issues.
fields.error: Please consent to the terms and conditions

slides.title: Thank you :-)
slides.body:
Well done! Thank you for taking the time to fill out the OCI Lab contributor registration form! Your response has been published here on edgeryders.eu, and you can adapt it there if needed.

You will receive an e-mail confirming your participation and your new edgeryders.eu account that you can use to edit your response and contribute to the discussion below it.

messages.networkError: Sorry, we were unable to store your response due to a network connectivity issue. Please try clicking on "Send" again.
messages.username: It seems somebody has already chosen your preferred username / nickname. Please enter a different one and click again on "Send".
messages.email: It seems you already have an account on our forum using this e-mail address, or have entered an invalid address. Please choose a different e-mail address and click again on "Send".
messages.default: Sorry, we were unable to store your response due to an unknown error. Please try clicking on "Send" again.
